data.description:
Hololight Stream serves as a platform for accessing and utilizing Hololight Stream SDK.

The Hololight Stream application acts as a gateway to the Hololight Stream ecosystem, providing users with a streamlined interface to interact with AR content and features. It is designed to be compatible with various AR/VR-enabled devices such as XR devices, smartphones, and tablets, allowing users to access the Hololight Stream platform regardless of their preferred hardware.

Hololight Stream SDK is a powerful remote rendering solution designed to stream high-quality XR experiences from local servers or cloud-based infrastructure. Stream entire AR or VR applications, visualize high-polygon content.

The Hololight Stream app from Hololight aims to provide a comprehensive and user-friendly interface for accessing and managing AR/VR content within the Hololight Stream ecosystem. By leveraging the power of augmented reality, the app offers businesses new opportunities for collaboration, training, and enhancing productivity in various industries such as manufacturing, engineering, and logistics.

Test your integration of Hololight Stream SDK into your application, service or product with Hololight Stream.

Hololight is a global leader in Augmented and Virtual Reality technology, dedicated to unlocking the full potential of XR in the enterprise market. For more information, visit our website.

changelog.change_log:
NEW : ISAR can be used without MRTK
NEW : Support for the Unity XR Interaction Toolkit
NEW : Experimental alpha and depth support added
NEW : The used bandwidth is configurable
IMPROVED : MRTK Supports 2.6 and 2.7
IMPROVED : Performance
